trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible effects of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定拖放操作的可能效果。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the following classes: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
You can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> to display different mouse pointers for drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>以显示不同的鼠标指针拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a plus symbol for a Copy drag-and-drop operation, an arrow symbol for a Move drag-and-drop operation, or a red circle with a line through it symbol for a None drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以显示加号复制拖放操作，移动拖放操作，箭头符号或无符号一个有线条穿过的红圈拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: If you want to drop data at a position in the target that is not currently visible, you could scroll the target while dragging.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在不是当前可见的目标中的位置删除数据，您无法在拖动时滚动目标。

trans-unit.source: If a target does not support scrolling, you must make sure that the drop position is visible in the target before you begin the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标不支持滚动，则必须确保放置位置是在目标中可见之前开始拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The following are some scenarios when you might want to scroll a target:
trans-unit.target: 以下是你可能想要滚动目标一些方案：

trans-unit.source: You are dragging text into a document, and you want to drop the text at a position not visible in the document window.
trans-unit.target: 将文本拖动到文档中，并且你想要将文本放在文档窗口中不可见的位置。

trans-unit.source: You are dragging a file into a file tree, and you want to drop the file on a node not visible in the file tree.
trans-unit.target: 你将文件拖动到文件树中，并且你想要将文件放置在节点在文件树中不可见。

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects.Copy> enumeration when the user moves the mouse over the drop target during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects.Copy>枚举当用户在拖放操作期间将鼠标移到放置目标。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>完整的代码示例的方法。

trans-unit.source: The combination of the <see cref="F:System.Windows.DragDropEffects.Copy" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects.Move" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects.Scroll" /> effects.
The data from the drag source is copied to the drop target.
trans-unit.target: 将拖动源中的数据复制到放置目标。

trans-unit.source: The data from the drag source is linked to the drop target.
trans-unit.target: 将拖动源中的数据链接到放置目标。

trans-unit.source: The data from the drag source is moved to the drop target.
trans-unit.target: 将拖动源的数据移动到放置目标。

trans-unit.source: The drop target does not accept the data.
trans-unit.target: 放置目标不接受该数据。

trans-unit.source: The target can be scrolled while dragging to locate a drop position that is not currently visible in the target.
trans-unit.target: 拖动时可以滚动目标，以定位在目标中当前不可见的某个放置位置。
